alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 10:17PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Randolph and eastern Cleburne Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1017 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wedowee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heflin, Lake Wedowee, Ranburne, Fruithurst, Edwardsville, Muscadine, Morrison Cross Roads, Abernathy, Fosters Cross Roads, Mars Hills, Corinth, Newell, R.L. Harris Dam, Ofelia, Trickem, Lake Cleburne, I 20 Welcome Center and Micaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for east central Alabama.
